item.title: Blue_Flame's Paint Flasher
item.dc:creator: @blue_flame blue_flame
item.description:
@blue_flame wrote:

this is my script. i made it. to use it you must open scar and put the script in scar. Push play and it should work. You must have paint on your startbar. i can make it to where you dont have to have paint on the start bar but i dont want to right now.

Sometimes it will mess up and not choose the paint bucket (depends on how fast your comp runs). if it does it just stop the script and start it again.

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // Paint Flasher V1.12 By Blue_Flame // // This may cause Seizure so dont use it if you have a chance of // // having one. If you have a Seizure I am not responsible!!!! // // USE AT YOUR OWN RISK! // ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

///Version 1.0 Had to have paint in certain spot and
///had to have paint full screen
///Version 1.1 added bitmap. No longer need to have certain things.
///Version 1.12 I added a new way to find the start button using dtm
program PaintFLASHER;

var flash:integer;PIcon:integer;x,y:integer;Pbucket:integer;Green:integer;
red:integer;Starticon:Integer;warning:string;warning2:string;warning3,warning4:string;
warning5,warning6,warning7:string;

const
{------------------------------------------------------------------}
Flashes = 300;//how many times to change colors
M0 = 1;//way to open start. 1=new way using dtm to find the start icon
//2=old way using coordinates (must have 1024X768 desktop)
{------------------------------------------------------------------}

procedure Load;
begin
PIcon := BitmapFromString(14, 2, ‘8BB7DF8ADB8A3D9F310167014’ +
‘05E14EBBB05D4A1018A691A4073C3708DC0A37E82AB98A0A7ADBE’ +
‘A1B1C8EAF0ECB4D2B590CAA79AD7BD9ED0B8DEE48ED0D080ABB38’ +
‘CAADDF0B8E3E9CAD6CA9FB6CBE4744BEBD7CF’);

Pbucket := BitmapFromString(13, 4, ‘z78DA737576B574B130C000’ +
‘CE6008016E180053DC00074036C7C0C0C9CDC98D10495B73B0998’ +
‘66C26A6F9D80100C76B430B’);

Green := BitmapFromString(12, 2, ‘z78DA33307073330082C14202’ +
‘00D1981F21’);

red := BitmapFromString(12, 2, ‘z78DA7373330002B741430200D9’ +
‘D81F21’);

Starticon := DTMFromString(‘78DA63146160607067624006AED11FC034231’ +
‘0836418C530D538C79BC2D58069714C35ABBA5851D40000127904’ +
‘C5’);
end;

procedure OpeningPaint;
begin
warning:=‘Dont use this if you have a chance of having a Seizure!’
warning2:=‘You have 5 seconds to stop this script’
warning3:=‘You have 4 seconds to stop this script’
warning4:=‘You have 3 seconds to stop this script’
warning5:=‘You have 2 seconds to stop this script’
warning6:=‘You have 1 seconds to stop this script’
warning7:=‘Too late :-(’

if(m0=1)then
begin
Writeln(warning);
Writeln(warning2);
wait(1000)
Writeln(warning3);
wait(1000)
Writeln(warning4);
wait(1000)
Writeln(warning5);
wait(1000)
Writeln(warning6);
wait(1000)
Writeln(warning7);
Load;
if(FindDTM(Starticon,x,y,0,0,22,751))then
Movemouse(x,y);
Wait(15);
Clickmouse(x,y, True);
Wait(45);
findbitmap(PIcon,x,y);
wait(2000);
movemouse(x,y);
wait(20);
clickmouse(x,y, True);
wait(1000);
findbitmap(Pbucket,x,y);
Wait(300);
Movemouse(x,y);
Wait(150);
Clickmouse(x,y, True);
Wait(200)
findbitmap(Green, x,y);
wait(150);
MoveMouse(x,y);
wait(150);
Clickmouse(x,y, True);
Wait(300);
findbitmap(red, x,y);
wait(150);
Movemouse(x,y);
Wait(150);
Clickmouse(x,y, False);
Wait(150);
Movemouse(425, 321);
Wait(400);
end;
if(m0=2)then
begin
Writeln(warning);
Writeln(warning2);
Wait(5000);
load;
Movemouse(38, 756);
Wait(150);
Clickmouse(38, 756, True);
Wait(450);
findbitmap(PIcon,x,y);
wait(2000);
movemouse(x,y);
wait(20);
clickmouse(x,y, True);
wait(1000);
findbitmap(Pbucket,x,y);
Wait(300);
Movemouse(x,y);
Wait(150);
Clickmouse(x,y, True);
Wait(200)
findbitmap(Green, x,y);
wait(150);
MoveMouse(x,y);
wait(150);
Clickmouse(x,y, True);
Wait(300);
findbitmap(red, x,y);
wait(150);
Movemouse(x,y);
Wait(150);
Clickmouse(x,y, False);
Wait(150);
Movemouse(425, 321);
Wait(400);
end;
end;
procedure flashing;
begin
clickmouse(425, 321, True);
Wait(5)
Clickmouse(425, 321, False);
Wait(5)
end;
begin
OpeningPaint;
repeat
flashing;
flash:=flash+1
until(Flashes=flash);
end.

Read full topic
